meanings.definition: A swastika, especially as a decorative motif.
meanings.sent1: The artist painted a gammadion on the wall to bring good luck.
meanings.sent2: The ancient vase was adorned with a beautiful gammadion design.
meanings.sent3: At the festival, the children made gammadion-shaped cookies to share.
meanings.sent4: The gammadion of stars in the night sky seemed to guide the lost travelers.
meanings.sent5: The intricate gammadion pattern was etched into the stone monument.

meanings.definition: A cross with arms bent at right angles, resembling a swastika.
meanings.sent1: The church displayed a gammadion on its stained glass window.
meanings.sent2: During the ceremony, the priest held a wooden gammadion.
meanings.sent3: The chef baked a delicious cake in the shape of a gammadion cross.
meanings.sent4: The shadows cast by the gammadion cross danced on the cathedral floor.
meanings.sent5: The ancient manuscript depicted warriors carrying gammadion shields.
